resources.string:
"I used to be a roofer. As a roofer, I could only work when it wasn't raining and only when" " the job was big enough to afford to hire me. I was making just enough to live in a tiny " "studio and afford the bare necessities. I decided that I needed to change careers.
"
"
I went back to school to study Computer Engineering and I'm glad that I did because now I " "have a great job as a Firmware Engineer, I get better pay, the work is more satisfying, " "and I always have work to do.
"
"
Becoming a Firmware Engineer has been a great improvement in my life, but I want to do " "more. I want to do more work, increase my pay further, pay down all my debt, buy a house, " "and eventually I would like to start my own business - most likely designing and " "manufacturing smart transportation technology.
"
"
The greatest thing about my career now is that I get to spend more time with my wife and " "my daughter who is almost 2 years old.

"
